plot.content:
Like for plots/387, this packs doodle on a A4 watercoor paper and using this time 3 different inks. We can now see better the spiral sampling technique used.

This is a mix of Make a sea of shapes. and 3 colors for Genuary.art JAN.21 "Combine two (or more) of your pieces from previous days to make a new piece.". You can also see I have reused packing techniques like in the first genuary.art pieces I had.

data.title: Packing doodle curves â€“ 3 colors
data.description: Continuation of doodle curves exploration using 3 colors.

prev.content:
Packing doodle curves explore the idea to combine a few classical generative art technique to draw curious curves.

Factually here are the techniques used:

  • Circle packing to distribute the doodles.
  • Travelling Salesman Problem to solve connecting closest circles together.
  • kmeans clustering to distribute the circles into groups and optimise the TSP.
  • "spiral sampling" which is a technique I created and used in many of my past plots. This is what makes the dot part. We don't see it much on this specific plot as the circles are small but I may do more plots in future.

This was implemented as candidate to genuary.art "Make a sea of shapes." of JAN.20.

data.title: Packing doodle curves
data.description: Packing doodle curves explore the idea to combine a few classical generative art technique to draw curious curves.
